name: Nike Art Gallery
description: One of the largest art galleries in West Africa featuring Nigerian and African contemporary art.

name: Lekki Conservation Centre
description: Nature reserve with a canopy walkway, picnic areas, and diverse wildlife.

name: National Museum Lagos
description: Houses Nigeria's cultural artifacts, including art, sculptures, and historical relics.

name: Freedom Park
description: A memorial park and cultural center hosting concerts, exhibitions, and festivals.

name: Elegushi Beach
description: A popular private beach offering music, nightlife, and local seafood.

name: Balogun Market
description: Bustling open-air market famous for fabrics, fashion, and local goods.

name: Terra Kulture
description: A cultural center for Nigerian theatre, art, literature, and food.

name: Eko Atlantic City
description: A new coastal city development with modern infrastructure and business opportunities.
